name: Wood Frog, Good Death
description:
Wood Frog, Good Death is a text-based game about being a frog-- specifically, a frog that freezes during the winter and dies in around three years.

In WFGD, you attempt to live the fullest life possible while watching the seasons pass you by-- you spend time with your family, practice dark magic, eat bugs, steal hats, and more. The goal of the game isn't to avoid dying, because the game always ends in death. The goal of the game is to live a fulfilling life, and to die a good death.
